document.full_text: the classic stage company takes on a production of the play 'double falsehood,' an adaption by lewis theobald of 'cardenio,' a very possible collaboration by shakespeare and john fletcher.
document.title: a lost shakespeare? it's a mystery
lines_and_colors: the classic stage company takes on a production of the play 'double falsehood,' an adaption by lewis theobald of 'cardenio,' a very possible collaboration by shakespeare and john fletcher.
